div.bibl: ABENDPOST, November 7th, 1893. Carter Harrison's Last Autograph.

body.p: Mr. Horstmann, the representative of the Berlin Porzellanfabrik, in the German department of the Industrial building has a book in his possession in which Carter Harrison signed his name at 6 o'clock of the evening when he was murdered.
Mr. Horstmann, as he heard of the murder a few hours later closed the book and made it a lasting memento to the tragical conclusion of the World's fair.
